1 """Contains the Car class.
2 License:
3  BSD 3-Clause License
4  Copyright (c) 2023, Autonomous Robotics Club of Purdue (Purdue ARC)
5  All rights reserved.
6 """
7 
8 # 3rd party modules
9 import pybullet as p
10 import math
11 import numpy as np
12 
13 # locations used for accessing car position and orientation
14 JOINT_IDS = (1, 0, 2) # X, Y, W
15 BASE_QUATERNION = [0., 0., 0.]
16 
17 
18 class Car(object):
19  def __init__(self, car_id, pos, orient, car_properties):
20  """Sets instance-based properties for a car and generates instance-based properties for a sim run."""
21  self._MAX_CURVATURE = None
22  self._STEERING_RATE = None
23  self._THROTTLE_TAU = None
24  self._STEERING_THROW = None
25  self._LENGTH = None
26  self._MAX_SPEED = None
27  self._psi = None
28  self.cmd = None
29  self.joint_ids = None
30  self._v_rear = None
31  self.id = car_id
32  self.init_pos = None
33  self.orient = None
34  self.simulate_effort = car_properties['simulate_effort']
35  self.set_properties(car_properties)
36 
37  self.body_link_id = 1 # urdf configuration
38 
39  self.reset(pos, orient)
40 
41  def set_properties(self, car_properties):
42  self._LENGTH = car_properties['length']
43  self._MAX_SPEED = car_properties['max_speed']
44  self._THROTTLE_TAU = car_properties['throttle_tau']
45  self._STEERING_THROW = car_properties['steering_throw']
46  self._STEERING_RATE = car_properties['steering_rate']
47  self._MAX_CURVATURE = math.tan(self._STEERING_THROW) / self._LENGTH
48 
49  def setCmd(self, cmd):
50  self.cmd = cmd
51 
52  def step(self, dt):
53  # get current yaw angle
54  _, orient = self.get_pose()
55  theta = p.getEulerFromQuaternion(orient)[2]
56 
57  if self.cmd is None:
58  return
59 
60  if self.simulate_effort:
61  # transfrom control input to reference angles and velocities
62  v_rear_ref = self.cmd[0] * self._MAX_SPEED
63  psi_ref = self.cmd[1] * self._STEERING_THROW
64 
65  # update rear wheel velocity using 1st order model
66  self._v_rear = (self._v_rear - v_rear_ref) * \
67  math.exp(-dt/self._THROTTLE_TAU) + v_rear_ref
68 
69  # update steering angle using massless acceleration to a fixed rate
70  if abs(psi_ref - self._psi) < self._STEERING_RATE * dt:
71  self._psi = psi_ref
72  else:
73  if psi_ref > self._psi:
74  self._psi += self._STEERING_RATE * dt
75  else:
76  self._psi -= self._STEERING_RATE * dt
77 
78  # using bicycle model, extrapolate future state
79  x_dot = self._v_rear * math.cos(theta + math.atan(math.tan(self._psi) / 2.0)) * \
80  math.sqrt(math.pow(math.tan(self._psi), 2.0) / 4.0 + 1.0)
81  y_dot = self._v_rear * math.sin(theta + math.atan(math.tan(self._psi) / 2.0)) * \
82  math.sqrt(math.pow(math.tan(self._psi), 2.0) / 4.0 + 1.0)
83  omega = self._v_rear * math.tan(self._psi) / self._LENGTH
84  else:
85  body_vel = self.cmd[0]
86  if abs(body_vel) > self._MAX_SPEED:
87  body_vel = math.copysign(self._MAX_SPEED, body_vel)
88 
89  body_curv = self.cmd[1]
90  if abs(body_curv) > self._MAX_CURVATURE:
91  body_curv = math.copysign(self._MAX_CURVATURE, body_curv)
92 
93  x_dot = body_vel * math.cos(theta)
94  y_dot = body_vel * math.sin(theta)
95  omega = body_vel * body_curv
96 
97  p.setJointMotorControlArray(self.id, self.joint_ids,
98  targetVelocities=(x_dot, y_dot, omega),
99  controlMode=p.VELOCITY_CONTROL,
100  forces=(5000, 5000, 5000))
101 
102  def get_pose(self, noise=None):
103  """
104  Randomizes and sets a new position for the car.
105  @param noise: The sensor noise and if it is present (None=no noise).
106  @return: The position and orientation of the car.
107  """
108  pos = p.getLinkState(self.id, self.body_link_id)[0]
109  heading = p.getJointState(self.id, self.joint_ids[2])[0]
110  orient = (0.0, 0.0, heading)
111  if noise:
112  if np.random.uniform() < noise['dropout']:
113  return None, None
114  else:
115  pos = np.random.normal(pos, noise['pos'])
116  orient = np.random.normal(orient, noise['orient'])
117 
118  return pos, p.getQuaternionFromEuler(orient)
119 
120  def get_velocity(self):
121  """Returns the linear and angular velocity of the car."""
122 
123  link_state = p.getLinkState(
124  self.id, self.body_link_id, computeLinkVelocity=1)
125  orient = link_state[1]
126  linear, angular = link_state[6:8]
127  heading = p.getEulerFromQuaternion(orient)[2]
128  r_inv = np.array([[math.cos(heading), -math.sin(heading), 0.],
129  [math.sin(heading), math.cos(heading), 0.],
130  [0., 0., 1.]], dtype=np.float32)
131  linear = r_inv @ linear
132 
133  return linear, angular
134 
135  def reset(self, pos, orient):
136  """Resets the car state with the new pose and orient."""
137  self.init_pos = pos
138  self.orient = orient
139 
140  self._v_rear = 0.0
141  self._psi = 0.0
142 
143  p.resetBasePositionAndOrientation(
144  self.id, [0., 0., pos[2]], p.getQuaternionFromEuler(BASE_QUATERNION))
145 
146  self.joint_ids = JOINT_IDS # X, Y, W
147  p.resetJointState(self.id, self.joint_ids[0], targetValue=pos[0])
148  p.resetJointState(self.id, self.joint_ids[1], targetValue=pos[1])
149  p.resetJointState(self.id, self.joint_ids[2], targetValue=orient[2])
150 
151  self.cmd = None
152 
153  def check_overlap(self, pos):
154  """
155  Returns whether the position will overlap with the current car.
156  @param pos: The position of the other object.
157  @return: Boolean if the positions overlap (true = overlap).
158  """
159 
160  val = ((pos[0] - self.init_pos[0]) * (pos[0] - self.init_pos[0])) + \
161  ((pos[1] - self.init_pos[1]) * (pos[1] - self.init_pos[1]))
162  dist = math.sqrt(val)
163  return dist < self._LENGTH
